DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine acute effect exercise vascular function woman nonobstructive coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Vascular Response Exercise Women With Nonobstructive Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Women likely nonobstructive coronary artery disease ( CAD ) . The purpose study examine acute effect exercise vascular function woman nonobstructive coronary artery disease . Endothelium-dependent -independent dilation , arterial stiffness wave reflection measure baseline walk treadmill slow pace 47 minute . Endothelium-dependent dilation measure use brachial artery flow-mediated dilation via high resolution ultrasonography . Endothelium-independent dilation measure use brachial artery dilation sublingual nitroglycerin . Arterial stiffness wave reflection measure use applanation tonometry .
DOC.criteria: woman nonobstructive coronary artery disease document coronary angiogram age 18 89 year use tobacco product use oral contraceptive hormone replacement therapy pregnancy ( positive urine pregnancy test ) lactation history hepatic disease infection hepatitis B , C HIV
